item.title: #ShutDownAcademia #ShutDownSTEM
item.author: frederick.boehm@gmail.com (Frederick J. Boehm)
item.description: Tomorrow my lab will participate in #ShutDownAcademia #ShutDownSTEM. I’ll stay at home instead of traveling to my office. And instead of doing my usual research, I’ll read, watch, and listen to pieces listed on the organizers’ website: https://www.shutdownstem.com/. I hope that you’ll join me in participating.
